channel.title: Exp code
channel.description: anyone know the code for how much exp you get per hit, i'd use the exp you get from a hit and search through client.java but its 12, and i have like 50,000 12s.

item.title: Exp code
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Well um heres How you find it

Search for

if (FightType == 1) // Accurate

Change the

TotalExp = (double)(EXPHERE * hitDiff);

To how much exp you want.

Btw change EXPHERE to the exp you want to get per hit when using accurate

that goes the same for

else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive

and

else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled

Read full topic
